Women in angelic attire and angels in women's attire, reimagining images and exploring satire in the mundane. The music of Bach, Saint-Saens and Vivaldi adds elegance, while modern-style dances provide contrast. The performance explores the theme of routine and the contrast between classical and modern approaches to dance and work.","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"value":"
